cloudlib.utils package¶

cloudlib.utils.basic module¶

cloudlib.utils.basic.dict_update(base_dict, update_dict)[source]¶

Return a dictionary of arguments to be used with requests.

If kwargs is a dictionary it will be used to update the ` request_args` which is then returned.

Parameters:
  • request_kwargs – dict
  • kwargs – dict
cloudlib.utils.basic.ensure_string(obj)[source]¶

Return String and if Unicode convert to string.

Parameters:obj – str || unicode
Returns:str
cloudlib.utils.basic.is_int(value)[source]¶

Return value as int if the value can be an int.

Parameters:value – str
Returns:int || str
